faqs.title: How do you calculate EMI ?
faqs.description: You can use our EMI calculator to calculate the monthly installments and tenure that suits you the best.You only need to enter the amount you need to borrow , interest amount and tenure to get the estimate of the installments

faqs.title: Why you should opt loans from Civil Loan?
faqs.description: Civil-Finloan offers loans that come with host of features and benefits, including Flexi Facility,Instant Approval,Minimal Documentation,Flexible documentation and Money in Bank in 24* hours

faqs.title: How can you contact us?
faqs.description: Simple ! Just fill in your details in the contact us page and our representative will assist you shortly to take it forward
